original_text: Then Jesus spoke to the people that had come to take hold of him. They were the leaders of the priests, and the leaders of the police in the temple. Other important Jews were also there. He said to them, ‘You have come here with swords and heavy sticks. Do you really think that I am leading people to fight against our country's rulers?
korean_text: 예수께서 그 잡으러 온 대제사장들과 성전의 경비대장들과 장로들에게 이르시되 너희가 강도를 잡는 것 같이 검과 몽치를 가지고 나왔느냐

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus spoke to the people
that had come to take hold of him
They were the leaders of the priests
and the leaders of the police in the temple
Other important Jews were also there
'You have come here with swords and heavy sticks
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 칼과 무거운 막대기를 가지고 이곳에 왔구나

sentences.original_text: Do you really think that I am leading people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 정말로 내가 사람들을 이끌고 있다고 생각하느냐

sentences.original_text: to fight against our country's rulers?'
